bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: George William Curtis (1824-1892) was an author, editor of Harper's Weekly, chancellor of the State University of New York, and resident of New York.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Collection contains letters, one of which concerns an article written by Curtis. In another letter (1885 January 15) Curtis writes briefly to abolitionist and women's rights advocate Parker Pillsbury, and mentions "the old abolitionists."
